name: The Lamb #6
description:
The Lamb #5
inspired by William Blake's poem 'The Lamb' 
The Lamb symbolizes innocence.In the poem Blake describes the lamb as a child. So why and how do we lose the innocence we had as children? 
While searching for answers to these questions, I preferred to paint mysterious and uncanny images. Because the loss of this good feature of our creation made me nervous. I did not use painting techniques on this serie, I’ve drawn them on paper in 2016.
I’m going to mint them daily till completed the serie. 
drawing and painting on paper 
3333 x 4688 px 300dpi
